name: iChess Park
summary: Chess is a puzzle game that is very popular in the world. iChess Park is committed to creating a style fresh and playable; you can learn to improve your chess level. Featuring support man-machine play and different levels of computers to accompany you to play against. iChess Park supports a double game (Friend Battle, hearty), the single-double switch (when the friend leaves, you can switch to man-machine mode, continue to battle), a variety of pieces type switch, silent mode, the Game Center, and unlimited undo, side battle, study, & side to improve.
